price: I Mi smo faraonu sve dokaze Naše pokazali, ali je on ipak porekao i da povjeruje odbio.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
